data.title: Vantage Data Centers Data Center in Offenbach am Main, Germany
data.meta_description: Vantage Data Centers FRA1 Frankfurt I Data Center Campus is located at Vantage Data center - FRA11, Goethering 27, Offenbach am Main, Germany. The data center is 452000 sqft. It has access to 56 MW of power.
data.text:
Introducing Vantage Data Centers' first Frankfurt campus, located in the highly desirable data center market of Offenbach. Just one kilometer from the main data centers and peering points in Frankfurt, and a short 15-minute drive from the airport, our campus sits on approximately eight acres.

Once fully developed, our state-of-the-art data center campus will span 452,000 square feet and consist of three multi-story buildings. These modern facilities will offer a combined 56MW of critical IT load, ensuring your data is in good hands.

By choosing Vantage Data Centers, you gain access to a wide range of advantages. Our sustainable and reliable cooling and power solutions, flexible room designs, and strict physical security measures are just the beginning. We also prioritize the happiness and comfort of your staff with top-notch amenities. Across all our locations, we maintain operational excellence and adhere to rigorous service and delivery standards.

Experience the best in data center services with Vantage Data Centers.
